Survived.content: That's a unique achievement across this many simulations.
Or perhaps you just weren't too hard on yourself.

Capsized.content: Or were you just too hard on yourself?
Well, it is what it is.

Main.content: We ought to finish our discussion from yesterday.
If we are to assume that objects are just social constructs.
Then is the self just another object?
Or is there more to it?
Can a self really physically exist?
We haven't got a way of knowing this answer.
But if we are to assume there is no self-
then you and I would be one in the same.
I am you and you are me.
So when we meet again, remember to call yourself Durme
